name: EclipseSHOE
body:
EclipseSHOE is a combination of the [CC-lisenced](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/) role-playing game Eclipse Phase and the rule-system GUMSHOE.

# Version
The current version of EclipseSHOE is 0.4. You can contribute by playtesting, commenting and giving [feedback](http://bit.ly/epshoequestions).

# Download
You can download the latest version of EclipseSHOE as a zip- or tar-file from the above links.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
